title: Where is the new Challenger skin?!?!?!
body: Every year since season 5, there has been a challenger skin that has been released dedicated to the start of the season. Why haven't we seen one this year?

replies.body: I think Jhin. Riot did give us Maokai . . . . . don't be shocked if they give us someone dumb.
Next month is when they come out.
Actually, they come out on the 7.1 Patch, (which yes is the exact same thing you are saying) but there is no challenger skin on the 7.1 PBE patch currently.
Which one do you think it should be ?  So far its been a pink skin for a girly champ so I dk who it will be for this year. Just hope its someone who doesnt have many skins...

They should give it to {{champion:112}}

He hasn't had a skin in 3 years and riot missed a perfect opportunity to do Viktorious Viktor. Was played throughout the season and worlds, and Faker won game 5 of worlds with him. Other good options are Jhin & Ekko but I really think Viktor deserves it more.
Based on if it's going to be for a female champ that isn't JG or Mid, and going by who might be due for a skin, I'm thinking Challenger Irelia
